abstract: New York Yankees postpone game against Detroit Tigers because of weather.
lead_paragraph: Blustery weather ranging from snow to hail to rain scuttled a nationally televised game against the Tigers in Detroit.

headline.main: Spring Has Arrived, but the Yankees May Beg to Differ
headline.print_headline: Spring Has Arrived, but the Yankees May Beg to Differ

snippet: Blustery weather ranging from snow to hail to rain scuttled a nationally televised game against the Tigers in Detroit.
